header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Discussing the past day, Wicken Fen nature reserve, Online banking, Savings and interest, Housing and issues, Issues about Daveâ€™s front door and door keys, Mapping genotypes, Planning the next day, Christmas cards, Choosing and delivering a Christmas present to friend, Issues with my mobility rollator, Changing battery in electric candle, Christmas lists
header.conv_type: Discussing, explaining, inquiring, requesting, making arrangements

body.u: so hhow's your day gone?

well I I it was good that I left early this morning because I erm it was a bit further than I anticipated and so I had to skate get my skates on erm when I arrived at the c pub carpark everybody was there fortunately nobody else had got there desperately early so erm it wasn't a big deal in the end although I was panicking towards the end of the journey
you weren't leading it?
no no no I wasn't the leader erm I can't remember who was l oh was the leader was the leader yeah
and was it or ? you seemed to be a bit
it was
undecided
well we went to the village of cos we went to the pub in but we were walking around but we went round a different direction than we'd done before so I didn't recognise any of it
well there's quite a bit of it
mm
I mean we went up here years ago
mm
that may be the last time I went do you remember there was a snowy weekend?
mm
one January?
I don't rea the things the place we walked round I don't recall remembering any of it from that trip though
well it is kind of a bit difficult to
I mean it's all kind of flat and looks the same really
yeah d we did we go past the centre?
I don't think they had a centre
well they've got a cottage which is a centre it's only open at the weekends but the we went past that certainly but we didn't go past a er a a major sort of show building or anything like that at all
well did you go to the main entrance? I'd have thought there was only one
no we didn't no no no er somebody else said we think we're sneaking in the back door
mm

we seemed to go through lots of fields and things the one that's really nice there was okay winter it was fairly low sun but because there wasn't much cloud there was the sun behind all the reeds you have the flags that wave about so they really looked quite spectacular oh and we saw some horses we saw some horses the funny horses in the
oh now that the funny horses we saw from a walk from the walk from didn't we?
yeah was that with ?
yeah is that the same place?
yeah yeah

yeah well yeah I got there via so it's quite a bit further out from yeah yes these are Przewalski horses or something
mm

but that quite happy on the quite coarse grazing there we saw some highland cattle as well both were quite a long way away the horses looked very suspicious they were watching us go there was about twelve of them they were qui about well I dunno six seven hundred metres away but they were watching us very suspiciously

I don't know I don't know I don't
well did you?
no not at all there was no we didn't go through any barriers or gates or anything
and not even at the centre?
no no that was at the side of the public road you know?
mm was that part of or not?
it w it it may have been I'm not entirely sure

it seemed to be a cer well there was a sign on their fence that said National Trust that way with an arrow

you know but I don't know if that was actually a National Trust building at all
mm and you had your lunch in ?
yeah the pub was very nice the I think it was yeah
does do they just have one do you think? is it that sort of place?

yes I think so it's not a big place but the the funny thing was just as we were about to set up another walking group arrived and they were having lunch at the pub as well so we checked the times fortunately they weren't eating till one o'clock and we were we'd set to twelve thirty but when we left after the meal the pub was actually stuffed to the gunnels
mm
there wasn't a spare space anywhere for food so they obviously they the food was very good so they've obviously got quite a reputation
what did you have?
oh I had stroganoff
uhu
which was superb somebody else had a sandwich which came a doorstep sandwich which came with a load of chips and green stuff and they were only expecting a thin girly sandwich
mm
so they were a bit
so everyone was happy with that one?
oh yeah oh yeah I think everybody did well you know so what have you been up to?
